about_the_game:
* Already available on Oculus Store (App Lab)
** You might want to try the Android version before you buy the VR version - Available on Google Play Store

Casual Snakes Combat. Kill other snakes and grow as much as you can.

- Against AI mode
- Classic single snake mode
- Bed mode (play while lying in bed in VR)

* This is still a work in progress. Next big update will include:
- Multiplayer mode
- Improved AI Brain
- Idle Auto Pilot mode
detailed_description:
* Already available on Oculus Store (App Lab)
** You might want to try the Android version before you buy the VR version - Available on Google Play Store

Casual Snakes Combat. Kill other snakes and grow as much as you can.

- Against AI mode
- Classic single snake mode
- Bed mode (play while lying in bed in VR)

* This is still a work in progress. Next big update will include:
- Multiplayer mode
- Improved AI Brain
- Idle Auto Pilot mode

name: Snakes LTD VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Quest Link
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Casual Snakes Combat. Kill other snakes and grow as much as you can.
